name: The Magic Swamp
description:
Welcome to... The Magic Swamp! 

Reunite Nessy the pink frog with her family, and speak to 110 frogs along the way! 

-

FEATURES

110 FRIENDLY FROGS

YOU CAN TALK TO EVERY SINGLE ONE!

-

CONTROLS

WASD to move 
SPACE to jump
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to interact with frogs

-

This game was made in 1 week for the theme 'Colour'!
